ygData.subject: FW: [shadowknight] Re: 9th Level Pet
ygData.msgSnippet: They didn t do anything, you did. Your Mana was determined by the Intelligence of your character. Had you put more points into Intelligence it should have
ygData.messageBody:
"They" didn't do anything, you did. Your Mana was determined by the
Intelligence of your character. Had you put more points into Intelligence it
should have helped (Don't know did the same thing myself). Can anyone verify
this?

-----Original Message-----
From: Robert Porter [mailto:frog42@...]
Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 4:55 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Re: 9th Level Pet


From: Robert Porter <frog42@...>

That's horrible. Why can't they just give us 4 mana to start? It's like
teasing us. We wait for level 9, thinking, I'm sooooo close to that pet,
then we get there and find the wait continues, but we have the burden of
keeping the spells while waiting to use them. Those B@$t@rd$!! I bet they
killed Kenny even!

Kakarot, Innoruuk


> ** Original Subject: [shadowknight] Re: 9th Level Pet
> ** Original Sender: erik lawrence antonsen <eantonse@...>
> ** Original Date: Mon, 3 May 1999 16:43:18 -0500 (CDT)

> ** Original Message follows...

>
> From: erik lawrence antonsen <eantonse@...>
>
>
> When I got level 9 I found that I couldn't cast both Leering corpse and
> Invisibility to Undead. I have also heard that some people have had to
> wait until Level 11 to cast them. You are not alone...
>
> Oogog
>
>
